IDBObjectStoreCreateIndex.summary:
The createIndex() method of the
interface creates and returns a new
object in the connected database. It creates a new
field/column defining a new data point for each database record to contain.

remarks.para:
Note that this method must be called only from a VersionChange transaction
mode callback.

IDBObjectStoreCreateIndex.returns: An object: the newly created index.
